package.name: simple_lio
package.description: This is a modified version of Faster-LIO and Fast-LIO2. The original algorithm are described in those following papers: "Faster_lio: Lightweight tightly coupled lidar-inertial odometry using parallel sparse incremental voxels,” IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters, vol. 7, no. 2, pp. 4861–4868, 2022. "Fast-lio2: Fast direct lidar-inertial odometry,” IEEE Transactions on Robotics, vol. 38, no. 4, pp. 2053–2073, 2022.
